name: Cat Lost In Space
description:
Controls:

- Left Click = Shooting and movement

Made Using:

- GameMaker Studio 2

- Aseprite

Credit:

- All music and sounds are from freesound.org

- Background music was made by user TheFlakesMaster

Summary:

- My second game jam, feel like it turned out fairly well considering the limitation was 8x8 sprites and this was my first time working with them. Managed to complete the project within the 3 day deadline this time as well. Enjoy :)
